review: I've the Fire TV Stick for about a month now and it has been awesome.  Set up was very easy and was watching my Netflix movies within 30 minutes (takes time to enter usernames/passwords for the different accounts).  I would recommend using the phone app (I have the android version) as an alternative remote when you are searching for items within Youtube, Netflix, etc as it is easier to type on the keyboard.
